title: Madman's Cure
description: I'm a madman...she's my cure. Once upon a time there was a devil and his bride.His hell awaited her while she tried to hide.He found her and trapped her inside.Where she had no choice but to stay at his side.Madman's Cure is book 2 of the Madman Duet and should be read after Madman's Method.
author: V.F. Mason
